title: Rich and Daily: A Farewell Fit for a Queen
description:
Queen Elizabeth II has been laid to rest. In the wake of her death 10 days ago, the Royal Family has reunited for various ceremonies and services to pay their final respects, along with a mourning nation. Today’s funeral service and subsequent burial marked the end of the long farewell to the Queen, but all the family drama is still alive and kicking. Over the weekend, King Charles was heckled in Wales, Harry and Meghan were uninvited from a pre-funeral event, and an ongoing feud between Prince William and Harry grabbed headlines. So now that the matriarch of the royals is gone, will this fragmented family fall apart, or somehow keep itself together?
